Articles.Content:
I made this rocket plane with some mods i found on these forums kudos to them! also, rocket planes rule

Tell me what you think/ improvements

Mods used are

Wobbly rockets (Updated to 1.05, Nuclear rockets, liquid engines, retros, more)

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=416.0

Long wings + a Gravity bomb

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=79.0

wow nice flying sir

would you mind sharing the ship file ?

and tell us wich mods you used for this ?

have to go now but would sure like to try that baby out later when i get back
Wow! this ship... err i mean plane is awesome! i am sure i want to test it out if you mind sharing the ship eh?
i will try to upload it soon, the mods i used is Sunday punch pack, orky bits for the textures and that big wings and drop bomb pack.
Fixed now with links with the mods i used and a download for what i made KAWABUNGA!
Its awesome , kinda hard to control , but after a while you can [glow=red,2,300]control [/glow]it easily ;P
yeah the RCS module is crucial if you want to turn or anything lol
Too bad the wings dont actualy create lift, otherwise this would have been even more awesome!
Thats the weird thing i have actually (with no engine power) glided down and then before hitting the ground gained altitude not alot but still, weird.
